Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive bacteria S. aures. It only inhibits C. albicans at very high concentration of 310 microM.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides and alytesin are co-secreted from the venom of the Midwife toad, Alytes maurus (Alytidae, Anura) Implications for the evolution of frog skin defensive secretions.
Literature.Author: König E, Zhou M, Wang L, Chen T, Bininda-Emonds OR, Shaw C.
